name: Student Management System
desc: A Python-based full-stack application designed for faculty to efficiently manage their students records with essential tools

name: Dynamic QUIZ App
desc: Dynamic quiz app built with JavaScript featuring interactive UI for engaging user experience and learning

name: Sales Forecasting
desc: Sales forecasting model developed with SARIMA technique, utilized historical data to predict future sales trends

desc: Blogify is a fully functional web application created using ReactJS and Django, seamless experience for users to create, edit, and delete their blog posts
